yo tbh i love this game and most of its mods and maps its rly fun and if you arent one of the, what 10, 20million ppl who have played it then buy i mean srsly i got it for 2 dollars along with the original portal for 2 dollars while they were on sale if u cant pay 10 then wait for a sale if u get it for story get portal 1 first then get this game but the original portal does not have multiplayer or mods so if u want those get this but i think u should get both but hey i dont control what u do i was gonna make a funny review but i couldnt think of anything so :P ummm oh btw a couple mods i would recommend are: portal stories: mel, Portal stories: vr (requires an htc vive or valve index and i havent played myself because personally i have a quest 2 and idk if it will work on a quest 2 but my friend tells me its good) and thats about it and when you finish the game i would recommend downloading some maps that are challenging to test ur skill ok sorry bout ranting bye have fun with the game if u get it

Portal 2 is full of adventure, excitement, and danger. it mentally challenges you and will leave you stumped and emotionally kill you. Along with all that, it has a lot of amazing and hilarious voice lines and interactions. I highly and deeply recommend this game.
